#id=1
#text=Last spring , I planted a tree in my backyard .
#id=2
#text=When I was a kid , we always had apples , because we had two apple trees in our backyard .
#id=3
#text=We used to make pies and applesauce and I wanted to have that at my house .
#id=4
#text=I went to the local nursery and I found a 6 foot tree .
#id=5
#text=With delivery , it was pretty expensive , but I figured it was worth it .
#id=6
#text=I dug out an area in my backyard .
#id=7
#text=I was surprised at how long it took and how much dirt that I had to move .
#id=8
#text=Digging the hole took me the longest time of the whole process .
#id=9
#text=I finally got that done and I stuck the tree in the ground .
#text=I read online about a fertilizer that was good for apple trees and mixed that in with the dirt as I was filling in the area around the roots .
#text=I do n't expect to get any apples this year and probably not next year , but the tree should be mature enough to start producing apples in the following years .
#text=The whole process took me about 3 hours to get the tree planted .
#text=I wish I would have paid someone to do it for me .
